name: Remap3

description.en: Returns a value between the [OutMinMax.x, OutMinMax.y] based on the linear interpolation of [InMinMax.x, InMinMax.y].
description.zh: 将输入值从 [InMinMax.x, InMinMax.y] 区间重映射到 [OutMinMax.x, OutMinMax.y] 后返回。

info.en: Minimum and Maximum values for input interpolation
Minimum and Maximum values for output interpolation

main: vec3 main(vec3 Input, vec2 InMinMax, vec2 OutMinMax)
